_meanings:
{@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of
the Ādityas. The senses of ‘party’,
‘a share of booty,’ ‘earnest money’,
which are said to occur in the Veda
are traceable to 1. above.

a secondary incarnation;
part of a portion.

slightly turned away, or
turned away towards the shoulder;
{#muKamaMSavivarti pakzmalAkzyAH#} <ls>Ś. 3. 26</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>
for {#aMsavivarti#}.

reduction of fractions to the same 
denominator ({#atulyacCedayo rASyoH samacCedakaraRaM#})
{#anyonyahArABihatO harAMSO rASyoH#} 
{#samacCedaviDAnamevam#} <ls>Līlā.</ls>
